title: Oil spills - worldwide
summary: This is a bar chart representing Oil Spill Event in the x axis and Amount of leaked oil (in tons) in the y axis.
The Amount of leaked oil (in tons) is highest at Oil Spill Event Itox Uno (Gulf of Mexico 1979 oil rig) and lowest at Oil Spill Event Erika (Atlantic 1999 tanker).
The highest Oil Spill Event Itox Uno (Gulf of Mexico 1979 oil rig) has 980000.0 more Amount of leaked oil (in tons) than the lowest Oil Spill Event Erika (Atlantic 1999 tanker).
min_summary: This bar chart has 12 columns on the x axis representing Oil Spill Event, and Amount of leaked oil (in tons) in each Oil Spill Event on the y axis.
The Amount of leaked oil (in tons) is appeared to be the highest at Oil Spill Event Itox Uno (Gulf of Mexico 1979 oil rig) and lowest at Oil Spill Event Erika (Atlantic 1999 tanker).
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Oil Spill Event in the x axis and Amount of leaked oil (in tons) in the y axis.
The Amount of leaked oil (in tons) is highest at Oil Spill Event Itox Uno (Gulf of Mexico 1979 oil rig) and lowest at Oil Spill Event Erika (Atlantic 1999 tanker).
The highest Oil Spill Event Itox Uno (Gulf of Mexico 1979 oil rig) has 980000.0 more Amount of leaked oil (in tons) than the lowest Oil Spill Event Erika (Atlantic 1999 tanker).
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Amount of leaked oil (in tons) for 12 number of Oil Spill Events.
Oil Spill Event Itox Uno (Gulf of Mexico 1979 oil rig) has the highest Amount of leaked oil (in tons) and Erika (Atlantic 1999 tanker) has the lowest Amount of leaked oil (in tons).
The highest Oil Spill Event Itox Uno (Gulf of Mexico 1979 oil rig) has 980000.0 more Amount of leaked oil (in tons) than the lowest Oil Spill Event Erika (Atlantic 1999 tanker).

Oil Spill Event Itox Uno (Gulf of Mexico 1979 oil rig) is higher than any other Oil Spill Events with value 1000000.0, followed by Gulf War (Persian Gulf 1991 oil platform), and Amoco Cadiz (Atlantic 1978 tanker). Down to Oil Spill Event Erika (Atlantic 1999 tanker) with the lowest value 20000.0.
Oil Spill Event Itox Uno (Gulf of Mexico 1979 oil rig), and Gulf War (Persian Gulf 1991 oil platform) have a similar Amount of leaked oil (in tons) that is 1000000.0.
The Oil Spill Event Erika (Atlantic 1999 tanker) has 3.92 times less Amount of leaked oil (in tons) than average.
